Introduction.content:
Every school has a goat. This school had Mbuzi wa Shule.

He was big, white, and always hungry.

He ate books, pencils, and homework.

Nobody knew he could read… until one Monday morning.

Chapter 1.chapter_title: The Goat Eats the Exam Paper
Chapter 1.content:
Teacher Juma put the Kiswahili exam on his desk and went for tea.

When he came back… the paper was inside the goat!

Teacher shouted, “You stupid goat!”

The goat looked up and answered, “Question 6 was too easy.”

![Teacher shocked, goat looking clever](https://picsum.photos/seed/teacher-shocked-goat/800/600)

The whole class screamed.

Chapter 2.content:
Teacher Juma gave the goat a new exam paper.

The goat ate it again… but first he wrote the answers with a pen in his mouth!

Score: 89 marks out of 100!

![Goat writing exam with pen in mouth](https://picsum.photos/seed/goat-writing-exam/800/600)

He beat half the students.

Chapter 3.chapter_title: Mbuzi wa Shule Becomes Head Prefect
Chapter 3.content:
The head teacher made a new rule:

Mbuzi wa Shule is now Head Prefect!

He wore a small prefect badge on his neck.

Every morning he rang the bell with his horns.

![Goat wearing prefect badge ringing bell](https://picsum.photos/seed/goat-prefect-bell/800/600)

Lazy students were very scared.

Chapter 4.content:
On Parents’ Day the results came out.

Position 1: Mbuzi wa Shule – A plain

Position 15: Teacher Juma’s own son

One angry mother shouted, “My child lost to a goat!”

![Angry parents pointing at goat](https://picsum.photos/seed/angry-parents-goat/800/600)

The goat just chewed the report card.

Chapter 5.content:
A big university saw the story on TV.

They gave Mbuzi wa Shule a full scholarship!

He now studies Veterinary Medicine… so he can treat himself.

![Goat wearing graduation cap](https://picsum.photos/seed/goat-graduation-cap/800/600)

He still eats the textbooks.

Conclusion.content:
The school now has two teachers:

- Teacher Juma
- Professor Mbuzi

Children study very hard… because nobody wants to fail against a goat again!

![Classroom with goat teaching at blackboard](https://picsum.photos/seed/goat-teaching-class/800/600)

The end.
